com.oryzone.mvdetector.differenceStrategy
Class AbstractDifferenceStrategy

java.lang.Object
  com.oryzone.mvdetector.differenceStrategy.AbstractDifferenceStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDifferenceStrategy
Direct Known Subclasses:
GreyscaleDifferenceStrategy, RgbDifferenceStrategy
public abstract class AbstractDifferenceStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDifferenceStrategy

Abstract class used as base to build specific difference strategies classes such as RgbDifferenceStrategy and GreyscaleDifferenceStrategy

Version:
1.0
Author:
Luciano Mammino, Andrea Mangano
See Also:
IDifferenceStrategy

getDifferenceAmount

public int getDifferenceAmount()
Description copied from interface: IDifferenceStrategy
Gets the amount of difference between the previous and current images. This value is generally calculated after a call to IDifferenceStrategy.calculateDifference(com.googlecode.javacv.cpp.opencv_core.IplImage, com.googlecode.javacv.cpp.opencv_core.IplImage).

Specified by:
getDifferenceAmount in interface IDifferenceStrategy
Returns:
an integer representing the amount of difference

Specified by:

getDifferenceImage

public com.googlecode.javacv.cpp.opencv_core.IplImage getDifferenceImage()
Description copied from interface: IDifferenceStrategy
Gets an image that graphically represents the difference between the previous and the current image. This value is generally calculated after a call to IDifferenceStrategy.calculateDifference(com.googlecode.javacv.cpp.opencv_core.IplImage, com.googlecode.javacv.cpp.opencv_core.IplImage).

Specified by:

an image that graphically represents the difference between the previous and the current image
